uk.ac.ox.comlab.diadem.oxpath.core.domlookup
Interface NodeReference

public interface NodeReference

Supports the DOM lookup functionality that creates unique references for finding fresh nodes in new documents. Remember to handle the notional root if passed it!

Author:
AndrewJSel

Method Summary
 OXPathContextNode getRenderedNode(diadem.common.web.dom.DOMDocument document)
          Returns the rendered node from the current document based on the reference

Returns the rendered node from the current document based on the reference

Parameters:
document - the document to find the fresh node
Returns:
the rendered node from the current document based on the reference
